comments.author: StresserNet
comments.body: ğŸ”‰ We are happy to release our NEW Signature Layer 7 Bypass Method. ğŸŒHTTPS-CUSTOM:The latest and greatest in our arsenal of methods, unlike other methods before it that attempt to "emulate" browsers, HTTPS-CUSTOM uses real browsers to attack your targets. This means that it has the highest bypass rate out of any method ever. This method also auto-detects all common protections such as Cloudflare, VShield, Sucuri, and many others along with being able to solve any JS Challenge that exists. HTTPS-CUSTOM will also automatically solve all HCaptcha and ReCaptchas within a few seconds on any bot protection pages. (With support for more Captchas soon).HTTPS-CUSTOM:One of the most advanced methods we have ever offered, and with that comes a lot of advanced arguments to be used, with this announcement we will attach a basic manual on how to use the method. If you require help please read this manual or contact us via Livechat or Telegram for assistance, but the quickest way is to read this manual.However, because this method is insane at bypassing ANY protection and requires huge amount of resources to keep it running, we have limited this method.For example:Customers will need a minimum of 3 concurrent attacks to send.1 Concurrent = 3 slots However, if this method receives positive feedback we can consider decreasing the limitations for our customers ğŸ˜ŠLayer 7: Network has been updated, with over 45,000+ unique IP addresses. ğŸ‡ºğŸ‡¸ğŸ‡¨ğŸ‡¦ğŸ‡·ğŸ‡ºğŸ‡³ğŸ‡±ğŸ‡¨ğŸ‡³ğŸ‡¹ğŸ‡¼ğŸ‡­ğŸ‡°ğŸ‡¯ğŸ‡µğŸ‡¹ğŸ‡­ğŸ‡®ğŸ‡©ğŸ‡»ğŸ‡³ğŸ‡°ğŸ‡·ğŸ‡§ğŸ‡·- The technology used by STRESSER.ORG is years ahead of any other platform and our infrastructure is much bigger. We have endless capacity. ğŸ”¥Website Tool: stresser.org â­ï¸Telegram: @stressernet â­ï¸Discount Code (20%): BYPASS20 (Expiring 8 days) â­ï¸

comments.author: StresserNet
comments.body: Features of HTTP-CUSTOM:Request method: GET/POSTGET, Send the data as a GET requestPOST, Send the data as a post request (Unless Request URL is set)Attack modes: Browser: Sends attacks using the browsers them self, allowing for HTTP/1.1, HTTP/2.0 or HTTP/3.0 requests to be sent depending on the web server (Best for bypassing)Socket:Opens the target with browsers to collect cookie data to send a socket based attack that results in high "RPS" doing this results in attacks being blocked easier.User Agents: All/Desktop/MobileAll, uses a mix of both Desktop and mobile user agentsDesktop, uses only common currently used Desktop user agentsMobile, uses only common currently used Mobile user agentsWait:0/3/5/10/15Wait X amount of seconds before collecting cookie data (If sockets type is enabled) or flooding (If browser type is enabled)Rand Query: True/False (Only recommended to be enabled for Cloudflare targets when using Socket type)True, sends a random query string with each request with a random length between 5 to 25 (Example: www.test.com/?345er6tfgy7uhijn65r4t7gyh8uij67tgy)False, turns this offCookies:Cookie data (Will overlap data sent with sockets mode, don't use if you are using sockets mode)Forced User Agent:Forces the user agent to whatever is set this bypasses what is set on the "User Agents" argument. Browser Multiplier:Sets the speed that the Browser type will send requests, recommended to not go over 5.Request URL:This changes the Target URL to a GET request, and allows you to send a POST request to a secondary URL (Request URL).Example below:------------------------------------------------Target: https://website.com/loginÂ  Request method: POSTRequest URL: https://api.website.com/login Post data: username=%RAND10%&password=%RAND10%------------------------------------------------This will send a GET request to https://website.com/login and then send POST data to https://api.website.com/login with the post data above.Post data:Set the POST data such as %RAND%/%RAND10%Try it now at 20% Discount Code (20% OFF): BYPASS20 ğŸ’¸ (Expiring in 8 days use now!)Website Tool: stresser.org â­ï¸Telegram: @stressernet â­ï¸

comments.author: StresserNet
comments.body: â„ï¸ DECEMBER UPDATE! â„ï¸â˜ƒï¸ Layer 4 Network:- STRESSER.ORG released new layer 4 methods for UDP & TCP as promised from our previous update announcement!- UDP: UDP-CUSTOM, UDP-SOURCE, GAME-SOURCE, GAME-FIVEM, GAME-RAKNET, GAME-QUAKE, GAME-SAMP.- UDP-CUSTOM: Special method includes customization payload (hex) users can enter, if users don't have payload just leave it empty as we have set a prefixed payload already.- TCP: TCP-CUSTOM, TCP-DATA, TCP-AMP.- TCP-CUSTOM: Special method includes customization payload (hex) users can enter. Includes TCP Flags option such as: SYN, ACK, FIN, RESET. Method supports following geolocations: ASIA, EUROPE, AFRICA, OCEANIA, AMERICAS, CHINA ğŸŒ- Added +200 slots to Layer 4 network!- All these methods support subnet option. Example: 127.0.0.1/24- Increased power for amplification methods 2x now!- Keep in mind these methods are in BETA mode and will be improved significantly over time.â˜ƒï¸ Layer 7 Network:- Since we have received positive feedback of our new bypass method HTTP-CUSTOM, we have decided to reduce the limitations from 1 concurrent = 3 slots, (1:3), to 1 concurrent = 2 slots (1:2) to allow users to launch more concurrent to bypass ANY protection.- Added +200 slots to HTTP-CUSTOM.- Added +250 to regular Layer 7 methods!- This brings our layer 7 total network capacity to: 1275 slots.â­ï¸ Our combined Network Capacity is now over 1800 Slots! â­ï¸â˜ƒï¸ UI Updates:- Added option Add Target feature to launch multiple group attacks.- Added option to Export API.- Added option to Create Preset.- Added option to Load Preset.- Added option to Schedule attacks.Try it now at a 10% discount with code: DEC10 ğŸ’¸Website Tool: stresser.orgÂ  (https://stresser.org/upgrade)â­ï¸Telegram: @stressernet â­ï¸Discount Code (10%): DEC10 â­ï¸
